remarks: A single hypothesis unification deduction with an assertion which is an implication with a 4-right-nested conjunction antecedent.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 30-May-2018.)
statement:
4animp1.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) -> ( ta <-> th ) ) $.
4animp1 $p |- ( ( ( ( ph /\ ps ) /\ ch ) /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
